item.title: Modern Statistics for Modern Biology

item.title: Single cell RNA-seq data analysis using Markov Affinity-Based Graph Imputation
item.description: import magic import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt X = pd.read_csv("test_data.csv") X.shape (500, 197) magic_operator = magic.MAGIC() X_magic = magic_operator.fit_transform(X, genes=['VIM', 'CDH1', 'ZEB1']) X_magic.shape Calculating MAGIC... Running MAGIC on 500 cells and 197 genes. Calculating graph and diffusion operator... Calculating PCA... Calculated PCA in 0.02 seconds. Calculating KNN search... Calculated KNN search in 0.04 seconds. Calculating affinities... Calculated affinities in 0.03 seconds. Calculated graph and diffusion operator in 0.
